thread.title: UK's Lewis out for rest of regular season
thread.title_full: UK's Lewis out for rest of regular season

title: UK's Lewis out for rest of regular season
text:
UK's Lewis out for rest of regular season Posted: Mon 8:06 PM, Oct 19, 2015 / Headlines List / Article 
LEXINGTON, Ky. (AP) Kentucky senior nose guard Melvin Lewis is out for the remainder of the regular season with a broken leg sustained in Thursday's loss to Auburn. 
Coach Mark Stoops said Monday the senior will have surgery Tuesday for a fractured fibula. The coach says recovery normally takes six weeks and that he hoped Lewis could heal in time to play in a bowl game if the Wildcats (4-2, 2-2 Southeastern Conference) qualify for postseason. 
Stoops says, "We need to try to win a few more games down the stretch here and give him an opportunity to try to come back and play one last time." 
Lewis had 20 tackles and a sack while starting four of six games. Sophomore Matt Elam will replace him in Saturday night's game at Mississippi State.
